item.title: My First Job - My first Blog!
item.description: Well, Hello! After a lot of thinking for the topic of my first blog, finally, I have a conclusion… Fruits Apple Orange Banana Vegies Cucumber Tomato Brinjal

item.title: My new job!
item.description: For a long time this website has had a couple of links to contact me, but those days are over. Now I have a brand new Hugo website with a custom written theme complete with A homepage with more social links, and description of my skills An about page with description of who I am A portfolio page to showcase all my projects A blog Why Hugo? The first question is why a site builder?
